title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When resizing the window in the vertical direction in the Control Example, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction, I observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames were flashing excessively.
EB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction, I expect that the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames do not flash excessively.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames are flashing excessively.
